frame.name: Destiny
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> will come to hold with respect to a <fen>Protagonist</fen> at some future time. The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is not conceived of as having control over whether the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> will hold: obscurely related previous actions or circumstances, or some hidden power may have already determined that it will occur.
<ex><fex name="soa">Exile</fex> <m>was</m> <fex name="pro">his</fex> <t>fate</t> and he triumphantly turned it into the fruit of his life.</ex>
<ex>One could say that it <m>was</m> <fex name="pro">Indonesia's</fex> <t>destiny</t> <fex name="soa">to initiate the decolonization process</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="pro">The sun's</fex> ultimate <t>fate</t> <m>is</m> <fex name="rol">as a white dwarf, a dense, cold core the size of the earth</fex>.</ex>
<ex>At the time it did not appear that <fex name="soa">greatness</fex> <m>was</m> <m>in</m> <fex name="Protagonist">her</fex> <t>stars</t>.</ex>
<ex>Nine for <fex name="Protagonist">mortal men</fex> , <t>doomed</t> <fex name="State_of_affairs">to die</fex> .</ex>
<ex>This seemingly <t>predestined</t> <fex name="State_of_affairs">meeting between a creator and the model he has pursued all his life</fex> suggests a kind of miracle . </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> that is destined to occur to the Protagonist.</def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition: <def-root>The Protagonist is the one for whom the future <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is destined.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of the sort of <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> that will occur.
<ex>You are an important person with a <fex name="des">glorious</fex> <t>destiny</t> and you have a wonderful biography written about you.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Role</fen> filled by the <fen>Protagonist</fen> in his/her destiny.
<ex>Deciding that his true <t>destiny</t> <m>is</m> <fex name="rol">as a healer</fex>, Henderson returns home, planning to enter medical school.</ex>
<ex>His <t>destiny</t> <fex name="rol">as the disciple of Shri Krishna</fex> is to become the prototype of the perfect Yogi</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s future is determined.
<ex>Their <t>destiny</t> <fex name="tim">over those years</fex> was to gradually take charge of most of the world's operations.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location in which <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is destined to occur to the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is destined to occur to the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.</def-root>
